features: The mounting holes of REDSHELL doorbell mount are all on the back. Protect your smart doorbell from theft. Our doorbell mount features a unique T-shaped design that vision unobstructed access, allowing your smart doorbell to capture every important moment comprehensively. Enjoy optimal performance and reliable security. It is the best choice for apartment, home, office, and room renters.

Most brands of video doorbells fit perfectly inside REDSHELL doorbell camera mounts. Maximum size of Video Doorbell 3.22 inches wide x 5.9 inches tall x 1.68 inches depth. Perfectly fit for video doorbell 1/2/3/3 plus/4/2020/pro, and Blink video doorbell 2021, Euty doorbell, etc.

REDSHELL doorbell holder Suitable for most kinds of Anti-theft doors, inward opened door, and left or right opened door (outward opened door is not suitable), The thickness size of the door must be between 0.6 inches and 2.3 inches, and the gap between the door and frame is More than 0.06". It is recommended that you measure your door size before purchasing.

REDSHELL doorbell bracket is designed with simplicity in mind, it allows for quick and easy setup, saving you time and effort. REDSHELL no drill doorbell bracket offers easy removal without leaving any residue or damage to the door. It's the perfect choice for a hassle-free and damage-free installation experience.

At REDSHELL, we prioritize customer satisfaction above all else. We provide a 90 DAYS free replacement and 18 MONTHS quality guarantee. Any questions, please feel free to contact us, our dedicated support team is always ready to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have until you are satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was very easy to install and fits the ring camera well, So happy this exists for my daughter to use in her apartment

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my Ring 2nd Gen Dorbell. It was easy to assemble. I installed this on my front door. There was no issue with how it fit my front door. It is made to be put on the left side of your door or right, depending on how your door opens up. In my breezeway, I do not see anyone that has this setup. This doorbell mount will not be easy to take off and I need this because of the area I am in. Great product and it does work!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for an apartment
reviews.reviewText: It holds a ring doorbell very nicely. The case feels secure when the door is closed. The only issue is it doesn’t feel fully secure to the door when it is open and feels like you could knock it off while the door is open.It works good for us with our apartment and would recommend this to keep you home safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice doorbell cam holder
reviews.reviewText: This doorbell camera holder comes with everything you need. It fits my ring camera well. I live in an apartment so this is super handy so I don’t have to use adhesive or drill anything.
